=Recursion=
{{{
// test.c
int main(int argc, char** argv)
{
    int x = foo (10, 10);
    int p1 = taint();
    int p2 = taint();
    int y = foo (foo_iterative(p1), p2);
    int tainted = taint();
    int z = foo (tainted, 100);
    int t = foo_iterative(z);
    int q = foo (foo_iterative(tainted), tainted);
    int p = foo (100, tainted);
    
    return 0;
}

int foo_iterative(int n)
{
    int prev;
    int prev_prev;
    int i;
    int aux = taint();
    
    prev = 1;
    prev_prev = 1;
    
    if (n < 1)
        return 0;
    for (i = 2; i <= n; ++ i) {
        aux = prev + prev_prev;
        prev = prev_prev;
        prev_prev = aux;
    }
    return prev_prev;
}

int foo(int n, int x) 
{
    int r = taint();
    if (n > 1)
        r = n * bar(n);
    else 
        r = 1;
    return r;
}

int bar(int n)
{
    int r = taint();
    if (n > 1)
        r = n * foo(n, 100);
    else 
        r = 1;
    return r;
} 
}}}

=Pointers as parameters=
{{{
// test.c
int main(int argc, char** argv) 
{
    int tainted = taint();
    int result_test = 1;
    int result_tainted = 1;
    int result_generic = 1;
    int result_generic2 = argc; 
    factorial(&result_test, 100);
    factorial(&result_tainted, tainted);
    factorial(&result_generic, argc);
    factorial(&result_generic2, 1000);
    return 0;
} 


void factorial(int *result, int n)
{
    if (n == 0)
        return;
    *result = *result * n;
    factorial (result, n - 1);
}
}}}

=Loops=
{{{
// test.c
int main(int argc, int argc2, char** argv) //argc = G, argv = G
{
    int a, b, c, d, tainted, i;
    int a1, b1, c1, d1, i1;
    a = b = d = 0;
    c = tainted = taint();
    for (i = 0; i < argc; ++ i) {
        a++;
        while (b < 500) {
            do {
                c = argc + 1;
            } while (c < argc);
        }
        b+=tainted;
    }
    a1 = b1 = c1 = d1 = 0;
    for (i1 = 0; i1 < argc; ++ i1) {
        a1++;
        while (b1 < 500) {
            do {
                c1 = argc + 1;
            } while (c1 < argc); 
        }
        b1+=2;
    }
    return 0;
}
}}}
